author: PascalVerbruggen
body:
Why can't you use a UPN for the Credential parameter of Start-Job?

PSVersion                      5.1.17134.407
Windows 10 1803

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @PascalVerbruggen  The repo for PowerShell Core only. Please update your request for PowerShell Core latest version and repo steps with expected and actual results.

title: PSCredential versus UPN
